PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01772021-03-23FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectExtraordinary Borrowing Authority - 2020-2021
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2020-989 of December 4, 2020 in order to authorize the Minister of Finance to borrow money under extraordinary circumstances for the payment of any obligation of the Government of Canada until the earlier of March 31, 2021 or the day on which Economic Statement Implementation Act, 2020 comes into force.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Extraordinary Borrowing Authority - 2020-2021
